arts.ttl: John Heitinga agent speaks out on West Brom opportunity and chance of leaving Liverpool
arts.sum: John Heitinga arrived at Liverpool in the summer to become a key part of Arne Slot’s backroom team at Liverpool. With Slot facing the big task of replacing Jurgen Klopp, he worked to add to his usual backroom team and Heitinga was the man chosen.
